sentences.en: ...recording Ben as he goes about his business.
sentences.cn: …摄录本做自己的事的样子。

sentences.en: "I can't see it's any of your business," he raged.
sentences.cn: “这根本不关你的事，”他生气地说。

sentences.en: apart from being under new management, it's business as usual in the department.
sentences.cn: 除了管理层变了，该部门情况一切如常。

sentences.en: But by the year 2020 business computing will have changed beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 但是到了2020年，商业计算会变得面目全非。

sentences.en: Carl began in the music business by running a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 卡尔是从经营录音棚开始干音乐这一行的。

sentences.en: Have you seen David’s new car? It’s the business!
sentences.cn: 你见过戴维的新汽车吗？ 很不错啊！

sentences.en: He closed down the business and went into politics.
sentences.cn: 他关闭公司投身政治。

sentences.en: he had no business tampering with social services.
sentences.cn: 他无权干涉社会公益服务活动。

sentences.en: He has a wide range of business interests.
sentences.cn: 他的生意面很广。

sentences.en: He returned from a lunchtime drinking session with his business cronies.
sentences.cn: 中午跟那帮生意上的朋友喝完酒后，他回来了。

sentences.en: he was yelling at her to get out and mind her own business.
sentences.cn: 他向她大喊，让她滚，别多管闲事。

sentences.en: I am not in the business of making accusations.
sentences.cn: 我不提起控诉。

sentences.en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
sentences.cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

sentences.en: Management is confident about the way business is progressing.
sentences.cn: 管理层对业务发展的态势充满信心。

sentences.en: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
sentences.cn: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

sentences.en: Predicting voting trends from economic forecasts is a dodgy business.
sentences.cn: 根据对经济的预测来预言选举的走势不大可靠。

sentences.en: Rogers has got to do the business, score a hat trick or something.
sentences.cn: 罗杰斯必须来解决问题，玩个帽子戏法什么的。

sentences.en: She is currently doing a business studies course at Leeds.
sentences.cn: 她目前在利兹大学修读一门商科课程。

sentences.en: She won a grant to develop her own business.
sentences.cn: 她赢得了一笔拨款，用以扩展自己的企业。

sentences.en: Students on the course learn about all aspects of business.
sentences.cn: 这门课程的学生要学习商业活动的各个方面。

sentences.en: The king's indulgence towards his sons angered the business community.
sentences.cn: 国王对儿子们的纵容令商界恼火。

sentences.en: The tax increase sounded the death knell for the business.
sentences.cn: 税赋的增加为这个企业敲响了丧钟。

sentences.en: these weeds spread like nobody's business.
sentences.cn: 这些野草疯长。

sentences.en: They had alienated the one man who knew the business.
sentences.cn: 他们弄僵了同那个唯一懂行的人之间的关系。

sentences.en: they will have to import from overseas to remain in business.
sentences.cn: 为维持经营他们必须从国外进口。

sentences.en: This is it, folks: the best record guide in the business.
sentences.cn: 就是这个，伙计们，业内最好的唱片指南。

sentences.en: We do business with a number of Italian companies.
sentences.cn: 我们和一些意大利公司做生意。

sentences.en: You can pay to be upgraded to a business class seat.
sentences.cn: 你可以付费升级到商务舱。

phrases.tran_cn: 商业模式；经营模式；业务模式
经营策略；商业策略；企业发展战略
(英，非正式)（为达目标）采取必要行动，把事加成
好生意；有意义的业务往来
(非正式)非常高的程度（或标准）
(旧)把某人打发走；叫某人不要多管闲事

trans.tran_cn: 商业，生意，商务，公事，业务量，营业额，商业机构，企业，商店，职责，要点，事情，消费
trans.tran_en: the activity of making money by producing or buying and selling goods, or providing services
